about_the_game:
Harold they're destroying the universe




Until Oblivion is a slightly horrific narrative game that follows 17 year old nobody Emma Wilson as she tries to rekindle a dying relationship in a dying world. Join her in an increasingly nightmarish Halloween party and find out if anything (or anyone) is worth anything at all. Featuring an atmospheric hand-crafted world, striking gothic imagery, and teenage takes on faith, work, and interpersonal relationships, Until Oblivion is a unique psychological experience whose horror is only usurped by its heart. And there are lesbians.

Features:

  • 2.5D stylized artwork
  • Interactive dialogue with branching paths
  • Themes of loneliness, love, and loss
  • Time-loop yuri
  • Gradually building horror
  • Dark secrets and hidden lore
  • He's watching you



Flashing lights, bright colors, mild gore, implied self harm, mild jumpscares, disturbing imagery, depictions of hallucinations/insanity, swearing, possibly grating noises.



I would like to honor the following people who helped during the development process, and whose contributions made this game a reality:
Oli
Remmy
Lily
Vivian

Thank you so much for reading and checking out my game's page. This game is a pure passion project of mine and will always be 100% free, but you can help out by wishlisting if you're interested!

name: Until Oblivion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Until Oblivion is an atmospheric narrative game that follows 17 year old nobody Emma Wilson as she tries to rekindle a dying relationship in a dying world. Join her in an increasingly nightmarish Halloween party and find out if anything (or anyone) is worth anything at all.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
